basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I'm Errol Vidad. Naval Officer ==> Project Manager ==> Systems Analyst ==> Software Developer. I have over a decade of military experience in both active and reserve naval components and a year of defense contracting work in information systems. I am passionate about formulating innovative software solutions to address military challenges and I would like to bring my diverse expertise to benefit meaningful projects in the defense sector.

projects.title: Listening Room
projects.description: Navigating the quest to discover music suitable for various moods can often become monotonous. The Listening Room offers users the opportunity to receive fresh music recommendations by aligning with animated video selections that resonate with their current mood.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: Personal project for a study subject. I was responsible for developing an application that dynamically renders new data when a user enters information about a new city and its corresponding sales data into a form. The application then appends this newly entered data to an already existing table.

projects.title: CineMood
projects.description: Finding a movie to watch may take longer than watching a movie. CineMood allows the user to receive a movie recommendation based off the genre they choose and their current mood.
